hero.title: Hi, I'm Rana Muhammad Awais!

about.name: Rana Muhammad Awais
about.title: Frontend Developer
about.description: As a passionate web developer and ACCA student, I bring both analytical thinking and creative vision into my work. With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I create interactive, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces. My goal is to combine functionality with aesthetics to deliver seamless digital experiences. I'm always exploring new technologies and striving to push boundaries in frontend development.

education.degree: Bachelor Of Science In Computer Science
education.institution: Sir Syed Case Institute of Technology | SSCASEIT

projects.title: E-Commerce Store

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and contact information.

projects.title: Business Website
